Title: Series: Les images de tous les saincts et saintes de l'année
Series: Les images de tous les saints et saintes de l'année
Description: Four oval scenes, each related to religious events or saints celebrated in January; from left to right and top to bottom, a young female saint standing with a lion at her feet, and holding a palm leaf (St Prisca's Day, 18 January); a hooded, bearded man with bell tied around his waist and pig lying at his feet, reading a book (St Antony's Day, 17 January); a Pope and a Roman soldier standing side by side, both holding a palm leaf (Sts Fabian and Sebastian, 20 January); A young man stroking a lion in an arena (St Germanicus' Day, 19 January). c.1632/35 Etching
Curator's comments: From a set of 124 plates (a title, a frontispiece and 122 plates of 4 scenes each), see 1861,0713.511 for comment.
Bibliographic references: Meaume 1860 / Recherches sur la vie et les ouvrages de Jacques Callot (302-425)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
Acquisition notes: From the Scarisbrick collection of Callot's work: see comment on 1861,0713.1.
